data.text: @papertaehyung @Sallyarabs Thank you, I didn’t see this earlier. Correct. We all have to file what the event organizer wishes are and so does the stadium. 💜

@Sallyarabs @LilMeowMeowBTS7 Nope. It’s a private business, so regardless of the state mandate, they can impose the rules they want.. which is case to case basis depending on the organizer of events.. the stadium will follow the organizers rules, which in this case is hybe.
@LilMeowMeowBTS7 🤨 okay does the staff that works at the stadium know? They better not fuck I’m like they did in LA day 1
@LilMeowMeowBTS7 U mean some can insist on the going by the state rules even though hybe has set their own rules?
@Sallyarabs It can be a little crazy because it goes by the state.
@LilMeowMeowBTS7 I'm not from US so just curious as to how your laws work
@LilMeowMeowBTS7 But if the governor has given this directive and some concert goers insist on not wearing masks will it be lawful to take action against them.?

@Sallyarabs It was but then Nevada’s governor took it away and Allegiant’s website changed and said masks weren’t necessary but left it up to the event Organizer to make their own decision. https://t.co/dtYxAHX8Zh
